name: DONT-STOP-PUSHING
description:
Welcome to DONT-STOP-PUSHING! Some weird game I initially made in a week.

This game is a bizarre combination of: 

Boss Rush games like Cuphead 

Platform Fighters like Super Smash Bros. 

and Speed Platformers like Sonic 

Run and Jump through this odd game in a simplified art-style and remember to Don't Stop Pushing! 

Thanks For Playing!
